title: Looking for PSA graded T206 Walter Johnson Portrait
author: TheKid41

posts.post_title: Looking for PSA graded T206 Walter Johnson Portrait
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,

I'm looking for a PSA graded Walter Johnson in the 1.5 to 3 range. Please let me know if you currently have one available.

Thanks,
Mike

Still looking for a PSA 2 range T206 Johnson Portrait. Please Message me if you might have one available or you could point me in the direction of one ;)

Thanks again!
There is One for Sale on this board now.
